REGISTER_DESCRIPTION: This command is necessary to be used in order to start playing Sofi. You can also use this command to invite a friend to play Sofi
INVALID_USER: {{author}} The User-ID you provided is invalid
AUTHOR_QUARANTINE: {{author}} You are quarantined. Visit our [Guide](<https://guide.sofi.gg/user-status#quarantined>) for detailed information about the quarantined status.
REGISTER_MESSAGE:
Greetings {{user}} <:sofiwave:1008533250408456282>! You were invited to play Sofi.
We hope to see you around collecting cards and joining our events!
REFERRAL_FOOTER: Both you and your friend will obtain rewards after registering
AGREE_TOS: By agreeing, you accept Sofi's [Terms of Service](https://sofi.gg/terms "Terms of Service") & [Privacy Policy](https://sofi.gg/privacy)
EMBED_FOOTER: {{count}} users have been verified so far
VERIFY_MESSAGE:
Almost there! Click the button below to verify yourself on our website.
Join our [Official Support Server](<https://discord.gg/sofi>) if you face any issues!
DM_MESSAGE:
## Welcome to the Sofi Community!

Below you will find a few links to help you along your Sofi journey!

- [Official Sofi Support Server](https://discord.gg/sofi) <:sofi_cheers:1008533423960367134>
